body: Title say all, I have tried using The web archive but I couldnt find it, is there any other way?
body_tagged: Title say all, I have tried using The web archive but I couldnt find it, is there any other way?
title: How do I discover the day I joined MCZone?

replies.body: I looked up my buddy brian45er, but he wasn't there, even though I know he joined the same day I did...
replies.body_tagged: I looked up my buddy brian45er, but he wasn't there, even though I know he joined the same day I did...

replies.body: But do you know any other day to find out?

replies.body: Same for me, when I try it for myself it says It might not be in the web archive.
replies.body_tagged: Same for me, when I try it for myself it says It might not be in the web archive.

replies.body: Go to the old forums, click edit profile, the number with your name is your place :)
replies.body_tagged: Go to the old forums, click edit profile, the number with your name is your place :)

replies.body:
What do u mean?
The number next to my nick is 10442

replies.body:
That is incorrect, that shows the day you joined avicus 1.0.
as for mczone, either on any web archive service that predates November last year. If it none cached your profile, then your memory is the only way.

replies.body: i was there but I wasn't such a fan of it at the time but now.. awesome
replies.body_tagged: i was there but I wasn't such a fan of it at the time but now.. awesome

replies.body:
And I just discovered that I joined on June 5, 2013.
Back then, I was obsessed with finding a girl named Mining_Inc. I think I might try to do that again.
And the last post I ever made was:

so blazefox get 2 fps. Thanks for the info ill be sure to tell that to Fairy Tail. mwuhahahahaha.
